B

bond - package bond
 
Bond - Class in bond
The main entrypoint to Bond, providing static methods to be used for observing the behavior of your program.

I

IllegalSpyAgentException - Exception in bond
An exception thrown whenever an agent result or exception is requested (for example, through Bond.spy(String, Class)) and the agent that is found does not match the correct type.
IllegalSpyAgentException(String) - Constructor for exception bond.IllegalSpyAgentException

Used to check if Bond is currently active, which is iff you are currently testing.
